description: Part two, part single storey rear extension; single storey detached outbuilding (following demolition of existing garage); and front porch extension
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: P101 (Location Plan); P201 (Existing Plans and Elevations); P202 Rev C (Proposed Plans and Elevations).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roof(s) of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwellinghouse on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the development hereby approved.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
